# Solana Token Swap


## Instructions
### Prerequisites
```
solana-test-validator
anchor deploy
```
Then stop `solana-test-validator`

### Install Dependencies
```
yarn install
```

### Build
```
anchor build
```

### Test
```
anchor test
```

## Notable Changes
## Cargo.locl
```
# This file is automatically @generated by Cargo.
# It is not intended for manual editing.
version = 3
```

## Cargo.toml
```
idl-build = ["anchor-lang/idl-build", "anchor-spl/idl-build"]

[dependencies]
anchor-lang = "0.30.1"
anchor-spl = "0.30.1"
zeroize = "=1.3.0"
```

## Build
```
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build
```
